content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?><xml>   <node>     <title><a href="/issue70/editorial">Editorial Introduction to Issue 70</a></title>     <articleSummary>The editor introduces readers to the content of Ariadne Issue 70.</articleSummary>     <issueNumber><a href="/issue70">issue70</a></issueNumber>     <publishedDate>November 2012</publishedDate>     <articleType><a href="/category/article-type/editorial">editorial</a></articleType>     <authors><a href="/taxonomy/term/117/author-info">richard waller</a></authors>   </node>   <node>     <title><a href="/issue70/lyons">The ARK Project: Analysing Raptor at Kent</a></title>     <articleSummary>Leo Lyons describes how University of Kent librarians are benefitting from Raptor's ability to produce e-resource usage statistics and charts.</articleSummary>     <issueNumber><a href="/issue70">issue70</a></issueNumber>     <publishedDate>November 2012</publishedDate>     <articleType><a href="/category/article-type/feature-article">feature article</a></articleType>     <authors><a href="/taxonomy/term/16075/author-info">leo lyons</a></authors>   </node>   <node>     <title><a href="/issue70/meehan-et-al">SUSHI: Delivering Major Benefits to JUSP</a></title>     <articleSummary>Paul Meehan, Paul Needham and Ross MacIntyre explain the enormous time and cost benefits in using SUSHI to support rapid gathering of journal usage reports into the JUSP service.</articleSummary>     <issueNumber><a href="/issue70">issue70</a></issueNumber>     <publishedDate>November 2012</publishedDate>     <articleType><a href="/category/article-type/feature-article">feature article</a></articleType>     <authors><a href="/taxonomy/term/1108/author-info">paul meehan</a>, <a href="/category/authors/paul-needham">paul needham</a>, <a href="/category/authors/ross-macintyre">ross macintyre</a></authors>   </node> </xml>
